title: Craze
description: Galaxy Alien Warrior fighting for his planet, honor, love, and his one true mate…When Misty is abducted from Earth by terrifying beastly looking aliens, she’s ready to fight for her life. When Craze rescues her, he doesn’t expect to find his fated mate Misty, with her lush curves and tempting body.Now all he can think about is claiming all of her…soul, heart, and body…for his very own.And he will stop at nothing to claim her.Galaxy Alien Warriors series are Stand-alone Science Fiction alien abduction romance books with fated mates and a guaranteed HEA, no cheating, no cliffhangers, and plenty of impossible Alphas! So if you like it fast, and gritty, and sexy, this is for you!
author: Lara Larue
